text: Kannauj is a constituency of the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly covering the city of Kannauj in the Kannauj district of Uttar Pradesh, India. Kannauj is one of five assembly constituencies in the Kannauj (Lok Sabha constituency). Since 2008, this assembly constituency is numbered 198 amongst 403 constituencies. Currently this seat belongs to Samajwadi Party candidate Anil Kumar Dohare who won in last Assembly election of 2017 Uttar Pradesh Lagislative Elections defeating Bharatiya Janta Party candidate Banwari Lal Dohare by a margin of 2,454 votes. ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Uttar Pradesh Category:Kannauj
title: Kannauj (Assembly constituency)
